title: Die Flederhaus
description: Two brothers, one dilapidated house, and a colony of bats - what could be more scary about this case? Noah and Adam have a bat problem, and they can't agree on how to handle it. Should they run screaming, or man up when a bat comes their way? Only one man can decide!
author: shows@maximumfun.org (Jesse Thorn)
